docs.text: with the abundance of trite , recycled movies in the late '90s , there is a tremendous demand by movie lovers ( never mind movie critics ) for movies that present the wide film audience with something truly original : perhaps audaciously , perhaps purely thematically .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for the former , you need look no further than director tom tykwer's incredible german thriller run lola run , a movie that may make some viewers need a cooling off period afterwards .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: lola , a contemporary goth-girl with blazing red hair receives a desperate phone call from her boyfriend manni one day .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it seems that because she was late delivering something he lost a bag containing a hundred thousand marks , and if he doesn't deliver a hundred thousand marks within the next twenty minutes , he will be killed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this gives lola twenty minutes to come up with 100 , 000 marks , or her boyfriend dies .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: so she runs -- not just jogs , sprints -- in hopes that somehow , someway , she'll be able to obtain the money and save a life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: >from there , as critic steve rhodes described it , run lola run plays a bit like " sliding doors on steroids .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with a non-stop techno soundtrack , wierd camerawork , all kinds of insane zooms and a truly breakneck pace , anyone that is bored with run lola run has to be smoking something .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: indeed , the movie is often outrageously exciting , as well as bitterly ironic and subtly serious .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: very much like titanic , run lola run is an achievement with filmmaking much more than it is an achievement in film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the way the movie is made , for pure visual style , tykwer's movie is breathtaking ( literally , sometimes ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: thematically it does leave something to be desired ; it toys around with some intriguing ideas but does occasionally seem as if there is little substance behind all of the flash .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: while you are watching , this will not matter .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: running a breezy 81 minutes , this is one movie i wished was longer because it was so damn good while it lasted .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is the equivalent of a roller-coaster in the amount of thrills and fun that it offers .
docs.label: positive
